name: External Product Image Support
description: Explains how to use external HTTPS links for product photos to save VM disk space.
steps: Open your Item (e.g. Cà Phê Sữa Đá)
In the 'Image' field, instead of uploading, you can paste the external URL: https://vn1.co/uploads/ab376ea9952a9c8bcab7b774be53d9fe.jpg
